title: Forms of worship a woman can do on Menses in Ramadan | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: man which says what are the things that immense a woman in her menses can do in Ramadan especially during right during night everything that Muslims do other than praying and fasting a woman can do vacay reciting the Quran making dua connecting to her kinship doing good deeds feeding the poor the sky is the limit
